exp.hero_subtitle: Full stack developer with 3+ years of experience and a Computer Science MSc degree. Extensive development and QA experience gained at technology companies in Budapest.
exp.timeline_hint: ‚Üê Scroll to explore the full career journey ‚Üí
exp.job1_desc1: Developed 2 full-stack internal business applications (Angular/Python) serving 15+ users, scaling to 50-100 external clients
exp.job1_desc2: Reduced task completion time by 80% through workflow automation
exp.job1_desc3: Design and maintain database schemas in MSSQL, ensuring data integrity and optimal performance
exp.job1_desc4: Create technical documentation for developed systems and REST APIs
exp.job2_desc1: Designed and implemented MySQL database schema (15-20 tables) to enhance data management efficiency
exp.job2_desc2: Developed full-stack components (Angular/Python) for personalized targeting system handling 100+ campaigns
exp.job2_desc3: Delivered fully integrated client outreach module, improving automated messaging workflows
exp.job2_desc4: Contributed to optimizing digital marketing strategies through innovative software solutions
exp.job3_desc1: Contributed to 5 projects/year; developed and maintained business web apps using Angular, C#, MSSQL, and Docker
exp.job3_desc2: Owned testing strategy for a project: designed test plans, executed smoke, regression, functional, usability, exploratory, and acceptance testing
exp.job3_desc3: Created 50+ test cases; identified 40+ bugs per sprint across 20 user stories, collaborating with 3-4 developers
exp.job3_desc4: Maintained proactive communication with product owners; led consultations in 2-week Agile sprints
exp.job4_desc1: Created 2 desktop applications in C# with MSSQL for data transmission systems processing Teltonika GPS data
exp.job4_desc2: Processed real-time GPS data from 100+ vehicles at 10-60 second intervals per vehicle
exp.job4_desc3: Developed and enhanced interfaces for logistics monitoring and fleet management systems
exp.job4_desc4: Implemented data parsing solutions for XML and JSON formats from IoT devices
exp.job5_desc1: Identifying and generating new business leads, handling all business processes efficiently
exp.job5_desc2: Understanding client needs and answering questions professionally, managing complaints
exp.job6_desc1: Desktop application development for gas engine operation in C# using Visual Studio
exp.job6_desc2: User interface design, algorithm implementation, and MySQL database management

proj.hero_subtitle: A selection of my university and personal projects. Image processing, computer vision, and application development.
proj.thesis_subtitle: Automatic segmentation of moving objects with partial occlusion
proj.thesis_desc: Development of image processing algorithms for automatic tracking and segmentation of rats in cage video recordings, handling partial occlusions.
proj.thesis_h1: Background subtraction and Alpha Shape based segmentation
proj.thesis_h2: Keypoint detection for resolving partial occlusions
proj.thesis_h3: Automatic object tracking on video recordings
proj.vmouse_subtitle: Hand gesture based touchless mouse control
proj.vmouse_desc: Real-time hand tracking and gesture recognition for touchless mouse control with multi-threaded processing.
proj.vmouse_h3: Multi-threaded architecture for fast response time
proj.cell_subtitle: Automatic cell nucleus detection and classification
proj.cell_desc: Automatic detection, classification by brownness, and contour visualization of cell nuclei in microscopic images.
proj.cell_h3: Python module with configurable input/output paths
proj.spendlens_subtitle: Smart expense tracker based on receipt scanning
proj.spendlens_desc: Android app that automatically recognizes products from receipt photos, categorizes them, and generates monthly reports on spending habits.
proj.spendlens_h1: Receipt OCR recognition using ML Kit
proj.spendlens_h2: Automatic categorization (food, drinks, cleaning supplies, etc.)
proj.spendlens_h3: Monthly reports and spending trend visualization
proj.portfolio_desc: This website! A modern, dark-themed Angular application with 4 language support, animations, and interactive elements.
proj.portfolio_h2: Custom i18n system with 4 languages (HU, EN, DE, ES)
proj.portfolio_h3: Custom animations, 3D effects, and interactive elements
proj.cta_subtitle: If you're interested in my work and want to collaborate on a project, feel free to reach out!
